title: A Workflow to Detect, Monitor, and Update Lists of Coordinated Social Media Accounts Across Time - UniUrb
snippet: Fabio Giglietto is mentioned as an Associate Professor of Internet Studies at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo. His research focuses on information theory and the societal impacts of media and digital technologies. The document also cites research by Marino & Giglietto (2023) on weaponized quotes.
description: This document from UniUrb details a workflow for detecting coordinated social media accounts, co-authored by Fabio Giglietto, and cites his other research on weaponized quotes.

title: Mapping Italian News Research Program - Uniurb
snippet: Fabio Giglietto co-authored a white paper titled 'The State of Social Media Research APIs & Tools in the Digital Services Act Era' which explores how the Digital Services Act (DSA) is transforming data access for platform research.
description: The content describes a white paper co-authored by Fabio Giglietto about the impact of the Digital Services Act (DSA) on social media research and data access, indicating his expertise in this area.

title: There was coordinated inauthentic user behavior in the COVID-19 German X-discourse, but did it really matter? - Frontiers
snippet: This study references Giglietto et al.'s work on Coordinated Link Sharing Behavior (CLSB) during the 2018 and 2019 Italian elections and the Italian coronavirus outbreak, highlighting how coordinated networks amplified certain news sources while suppressing others.
description: This study on coordinated inauthentic behavior in the German X-discourse during COVID-19 references Fabio Giglietto's work on Coordinated Link Sharing Behavior (CLSB) in Italian elections and the coronavirus outbreak, highlighting how such networks amplify specific news sources.

title: In the Shadows of Disinformation: Fake News and Violations of Human Rights - ResearchGate
snippet: This report references Giglietto et al.'s definition of disinformation as deliberately false information with the intent to deceive.
description: This report, titled "In the Shadows of Disinformation: Fake News and Violations of Human Rights," published on ResearchGate, cites Fabio Giglietto's definition of disinformation.

title: L’articolo 21 nella gabbia di Facebook - Terzogiornale
Il Premio Rimini Mundi a sette ambasciatori del congressuale - lapiazzarimini.it
Advancing Research on Disinformation and Digital Manipulation: The University of Urbino at two Key Conferences in Brazil – vera.ai VERification Assisted by Artificial Intelligence
snippet: Professor Fabio Giglietto presented collaborative research with Dr. Giada Marino and Bruna Paroni that explores an innovative approach to analyzing political discourse: using fine-tuned large language models (LLMs) to examine political talk in hyperpartisan Facebook groups. He also moderated a roundtable discussion on 'Ruptures in Data Access: The State of Social Media Research APIs & Tools in the DSA Era'.
description: The content discusses Professor Fabio Giglietto's presentation on using LLMs to analyze political discourse in Facebook groups and his moderation of a roundtable on data access in the DSA era, highlighting his expertise in social media research and disinformation.

title: Il movimento religioso cinese che si è infiltrato in un gruppo Facebook urbinate - il Ducato
